description: Try our easy to follow Ham & Cheese Quesadillas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ham & Cheese Quesadillas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 150g Bertocchi Premium Boneless Leg Ham Sliced From The Deli, shaved

recipeInstructions.text: Make guacamole by mashing the avocado together with the lime juice and coriander. Season with salt and pepper.
Spread two flour tortillas with the pesto and top with half the ham, cheese and spinach. Top each with another tortilla.

Place each quesadilla carefully into a non-stick fry pan and cook for 2-3 minutes each side, until golden and crispy. Alternately, cook in a sandwich maker for 3 minutes. Cut into quarters and serve with a dollop of guacamole.
